name: KODA
tagline: Luxury Branding, Marketing and Design Agency
description: We are KODA, a branding, marketing and design agency with a sole focus on developing profitable luxury and upscale brands. Our approach is graceful yet voracious. While that means different things to different clients, they all agree on this: KODA delivers results far beyond the scope of traditional marketing. Our firm continues to occupy a space unto ourselves at the intersection of deep business expertise and marketing experience.
